turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Xarxa Vives d'Universitats.
turn.1: What is the difference between Xarxa Vives d'Universitats and other higher education institutions?
turn.2: Xarxa Vives d'Universitats The Xarxa Vives d'Universitats (, acronym: "XVU"; English: "Vives Network"), formerly known as Institut Joan Lluís Vives (English: "Joan Lluís Vives Institute"), is the network of Catalan language universities.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: XVU was founded in 1994 and it is headquartered in the Valencian Community, in the city of Castelló de la Plana.
turn.5: Is there anything else that is notable?
turn.6: On May 21, 2008, it was integrated into the Ramon Llull Institute.
turn.7: Why is it named after him?
turn.8: The institute is named after Joan Lluís Vives, a prominent Valencian scholar and humanist from the 16th century.
turn.9: Is there anything else that is interesting?
turn.10: The network currently comprises 21 universities situated in the Catalan language domain, in four different states (Andorra, France, Italy and Spain).
